name: vscode-vtools
description: A collection of small tools for Visual Studio Code.

vtools.autoHideSideBar.description: Causes the side-bar to be hidden whenever the user clicks outside of it.

vtools.autoHideBottomBar.description: Causes the bottom-bar (output, terminal, etc.) to be hidden whenever the user clicks outside of it.

vtools.autoHideDelay.description: How long to wait (after the user clicks outside of the side-bar) before hiding the side-bar. (helps solve the unintended-selection issue -- especially when scrolled to the right)
